title: Biden has an aggressive form of prostate cancer. What to know
shortDescription: Doctors not involved in Biden's care said his diagnoses shows the challenges of screening for prostate cancer.

title: Trump admin terminates $60 million in Harvard grants over alleged antisemitism
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration has frozen or ended federal grants and contracts for the university worth nearly $3 billion in recent weeks.

title: Senate confirms Jared Kushner's father as ambassador to France
shortDescription: The Senate on Monday confirmed Charles Kushner, the father of Trump's son-in-law Jared Kushner, to be U.S. ambassador to France and Monaco.

title: Trump, Putin talk peace with Ukraine
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said after a two-hour call with Vladimir Putin that peace talks would begin “immediately" between Russia and Ukraine.

title: Trump wants probe into celebs who endorsed Harris
shortDescription: President Trump alleged without evidence that Beyonce, Bruce Springsteen, Oprah Winfrey and others were paid to publicly support Kamala Harris.

title: What is the Take It Down Act? New law takes on revenge porn, deepfakes
shortDescription: Trump has signed the bipartisan Take It Down Act into law in an effort to combat non-consensual intimate imagery, including deepfakes and revenge porn.

title: Biden's presidential legacy after cancer diagnosis
shortDescription: President Joe Biden announced he has prostate cancer. He was already under scrutiny for his mental acuity. Here's what we know now.

title: CBS News president steps down amid Trump's '60 Minutes' lawsuit
shortDescription: McMahon's exit is the second shakeup at CBS News over the past month, as parent company Paramount is locked in a legal battle with Trump administration.

title: Trump bans 'revenge porn': Melania Trump co-signs the document
shortDescription: The new law requires platforms to remove reported “nonconsensual, sexually exploitative images” within 48 hours of receiving a valid request.

title: What's in Trump's tax bill? Big Medicaid, SNAP changes
shortDescription: Fiscal conservatives are pushing for more cuts ahead of the May 22 vote.

title: SCOTUS lets Trump end Temporary Protected Status
shortDescription: The Supreme Court said the Trump administration can move to strip more than 300,000 Venezuelan migrants of temporary protected status.

title: Trump wants 'major investigation' into celeb endorsements of Harris
shortDescription: President Donald Trump alleged without evidence that stars like Bruce Springsteen and Beyoncé were paid by Kamala Harris to endorse her campaign.

title: Trump says Russia-Ukraine peace talks will start 'immediately'
shortDescription: Trump said after speaking with Putin that peace talks between Russia and Ukraine would begin 'immediately.'

title: Supreme Court allows President Trump to end legal protections for Venezuelans
shortDescription: The Supreme Court gave the Trump administration the green light to end the legal protections for Venezuelan nationals in the country.

title: Trump: Nations must negotiate tariffs in ‘good faith’, says Bessent
shortDescription: On Sunday, Treasury Secretary Bessent told NBC News' "Meet the Press" the administration was focused on its 18 most important trading relationships.

title: Supreme Court lets Trump end protected status for Venezuelan migrants for now
shortDescription: The Trump administration argued that courts can't stop the Homeland Security Department from abruptly ending a program for Venezuelan migrants.

title: White House: Tax cut bill won’t raise deficit
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said the 'Big Beautiful Bill' won't raise the deficit, but nonpartisan analysts say otherwise.

title: Understanding Biden's diagnosis: Prostate cancer testing and treatment
shortDescription: About 1 in 8 American men will get a prostate cancer diagnosis, researchers say. What to know about the disease following Biden's announcement.

title: Vance questions Biden's health as president after cancer diagnosis
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance said he doesn't believe Joe Biden "was in good enough health" to serve as president following his cancer diagnosis on Sunday.

title: Trump still 'trusts' doctors after shocking Biden cancer diagnosis
shortDescription: Joe Biden's diagnoses of an 'aggressive form' of cancer has raised questions about why the disease wasn't detected earlier.

title: Biden's cancer diagnosis prompts surge of sympathy, but also anger
shortDescription: Reckoning ahead? After a lifetime in public office, the former president faces a perilous cancer diagnosis and difficult questions.

title: What is a Gleason score? Explaining Biden's prostate cancer
shortDescription: Biden's cancer is characterized as having a Gleason score of 9. Here's what to know about the system for describing prostate cancer and what it means.

title: Trump's sweeping tax-cut bill passes key committee
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's sweeping tax-cut bill passed a key committee and will move to a House vote.

title: Experts: Biden’s cancer not curable, but treatable
shortDescription: Former President Joe Biden's cancer cells are ranked with a "high Gleason score." Here's what that means for his treatment.

title: Biden diagnosed with 'aggressive form' of prostate cancer | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Trump's tax bill passed in a key House committee vote. Also, investigations into what caused a ship to strike the Brooklyn Bridge. It's on The Excerpt.

title: Biden cancer: Former president speaks out for the first time since diagnosis
shortDescription: "Cancer touches us all. Like so many of you, Jill and I have learned that we are strongest in the broken places," Biden posted on social media May 19.

title: Daily Briefing: Joe Biden has cancer
shortDescription: The former president has one of the worst forms of prostate cancer. Here is the news to know on Monday.
